CustomField.description: This formula equals Amount (minus Non-Billable Incurred Amount and Tax if any) for billable Expenses and zero for non-billable Expenses: all in the incurred currency.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This formula equals Amount (minus Non-Billable Incurred Amount and Tax if any) for billable Expenses and zero for non-billable Expenses: all in the incurred currency.
CustomField.label: Billable Amount
